participant_1.background:
I want to learn how to knit sweaters to keep me warm in the winter.
My family works to support my dreams.
I have a lot of feelings, and I like to write them down in my journal.
i m the youngest of five.
I had to sell my motorcycle to pay for my car.

participant_2.background:
I usually spend my free time helping people in need.
my favorite band is a fine frenzy.
i can t get enough of lindsey stirling s music.
i am working in finance.
My appearance is not my main concern, since I care more about the environment and fighting for its protection.

content.text: Hi there! I am a bit anxious, but I would like to learn more about the environment.
Hey there! What are you anxious about? I am an environmental activist, so I am happy to talk about it!
I am worried about the future of our planet. I see so much pollution, and it is scary.

I understand your concern. It is scary, but I am hopeful for the future. I am working in finance, and I invest in companies that are working to protect the environment. I also volunteer my time to help people in need. I hope to make a difference.

You are doing great work! I am inspired by your dedication. I do not have much money to invest, but I can volunteer my time. I think I will start by helping people who are struggling to pay their bills.
That is a great idea! I am sure you will make a big difference in the lives of others.
Thank you for your encouragement. I am feeling better about the future of our planet. I know that there are people like you who are working to make it a better place.
Thank you! I am glad that I could help. I am sure that you will make a difference in the lives of others
